code:
/*
Language: ERB (Embedded Ruby)
Requires: xml.js, ruby.js
Author: Lucas Mazza <lucastmazza@gmail.com>
Contributors: Kassio Borges <kassioborgesm@gmail.com>
Description: "Bridge" language defining fragments of Ruby in HTML within <% .. %>
Website: https://ruby-doc.org/stdlib-2.6.5/libdoc/erb/rdoc/ERB.html
Category: template
*/ /** @type LanguageFn */function erb(hljs){return{name:'ERB',subLanguage:'xml',contains:[hljs.COMMENT('<%#','%>'),{begin:'<%[%=-]?',end:'[%-]?%>',subLanguage:'ruby',excludeBegin:true,excludeEnd:true}]};}module.exports=erb;
